Name: 圈圈工坊 OO.Inc
About the game: OO.Inc is a indie 3-Match-puz game. You are a newbie employee. Complete tasks and unlock new levels. Put material chains on the board.make a line of 3 same color to score.dots can be stacked on circles. Rank detial: 500-: D 500~999: C 1000~1999: B 2000~2999: A 3000+: S About Localization: Under 'StreamingAssets', you can find 'Localization.csv' and modify it. About LevelEditor: Under 'StreamingAssets', you can find 'TempleteSDS.csv' and modify it. GUI Editor will be accessable in later version. This game is made by myself. So, it may be unperfect or even bugly. If you have any question or suggestion, contact me with e-mail, please.
